text: All customers affected by the #powercut in #Spalding #PE12 have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
Engineers are working on a #powercut affecting customers in #Spalding #PE12 and estimate to restore all supplies by 15:00. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
All customers now have their supply restored following the #powercut in #Derby #DE21. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Derby #DE21 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 12:00. Andi.
We are pleased to say that all power supplies to the #Bath #BA1 #BA2 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Andi.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Bath #BA1 #BA2 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 09:30. Andi.
We are pleased to say that all power supplies to the #Sheffield #S21 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Andi.
All customers affected by a #powercut in #Heanor #DE75 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
Update #Powercut we've got most supplies back on in the #Sheffield #S21 area but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 13:00. Sorry for the delay. Andi.
Update #Powercut we've got most supplies back on in the #Heanor #DE75 area but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 10:30. Sorry for the delay. Andi.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Sheffield #S21 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 10:00. Andi.
Engineers are working on a #powercut in #Heanor #DE75 and estimate to restore all supplies by 09:00. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
